docs.title: savagecarol
docs.text:
Hi 👋, my name is Kartikeya Sharma.

I run a YouTube channel called @savagecarol, where I share content and tutorials.

I created this website so that everyone can learn and study System Design in a simple and practical way.

The goal of this site is to make system design concepts:

  • Easy to understand
  • Practical for interviews and real-world systems
  • Accessible to everyone

If you find this useful, feel free to check out my YouTube channel and share this site with others. 🚀

Happy learning!
